fields.request: Manual QA: Verify optional string fields store blanks instead of NULL values
fields.request_details: Log into the Django admin. Open the Nodes changelist and edit two different records. Clear the Constellation IP, IPv6 address, Gateway address, and MAC address fields for both entries and save; confirm both records save without errors and the form reopens with those fields empty instead of 'None'. Next, browse to the Invite leads admin (/admin/core/invitelead/) and add a record without providing an IP address, then reopen it to verify the IP address is stored as an empty value. Finally, visit the Landing leads admin (/admin/pages/landinglead/) and create a lead without an IP address, confirming the saved record shows an empty string rather than NULL.
